summary: This document is an email chain from November 2021 regarding travel and hotel arrangements for a witness and her family attending the Ghislaine Maxwell trial in New York. It includes a forwarded hotel confirmation for a stay at Hotel 50 Bowery from September 2021 and coordination details for the December 2021 trial dates.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the upcoming criminal trial that the email correspondents are traveling to attend.

persons.name: Sandra Ramos
persons.context: Sent the hotel confirmation email for Hotel 50 Bowery to a U.S. Attorney's Office contact.

persons.name: Anthony Toliver
persons.context: Was copied on the hotel confirmation email from Sandra Ramos.

events.title: Planned Travel for Maxwell Trial
events.description: A witness and her family plan to travel to New York to attend the Ghislaine Maxwell trial, with intended travel dates from December 1 to December 7, 2021.

events.title: Previous Hotel Stay at Hotel 50 Bowery
events.description: A hotel reservation was confirmed for a stay at Hotel 50 Bowery in New York City from September 16 to September 19, 2021.

locations: Hotel 50 Bowery, 50 Bowery, New York, NY 10013
United States Attorney's Office, Southern District of New York, 1 St. Andrews Plaza, New York, NY 10007
Freedom Hospitality, 100 Park Avenue, 16th Floor, New York, NY 10017
keyFacts: A witness and her family were having travel and hotel accommodations coordinated by the U.S. Attorney's Office for their attendance at the Ghislaine Maxwell trial in December 2021.
The email chain includes a forwarded hotel confirmation for a prior stay at Hotel 50 Bowery in New York from September 16-19, 2021.
The correspondence shows the Victim Witness Coordinator's office of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was involved in logistical support for trial witnesses.
The witness requested to travel on the same flight as her mother for convenience.
The document is primarily logistical and reveals no details about the underlying allegations of the Maxwell trial.
